entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
